author: Staff Reporter
text:
Goats worth Rs. 8.10 lakh were given to 27 people, who were once engaged in illicit liquor trade and abandoned it later, as part of rehabilitation measure here on Sunday.

Distributing the goats at a function in Natham here on Sunday, Collector T.N. Hariharan said that nine goats were given to each person.

A total 498 person had so far been rehabilitated in the district.

The alternative livelihood activity would help them lead a decent life, he added.
title: 27 get free goats
